## Description {#details}

Concrete implementation of a pure data dependence graph builder.

This class provides custom implementation for the pure-virtual functions used in the generic dependence graph build algorithm.

For information about time complexity of the build algorithm see the comments near the declaration of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder">AbstractDependenceGraphBuilder</a>.

Definition at line 346 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ddg-h">DDG.h</a>.
